job_details.Vacaturetitel: Graduate Software Engineer .NET and Frontend JavaScript
job_details.Functieomschrijving:
Work with our Microsoft tech stack including .NET Framework (transitioning to .NET Core), VB.NET and C# (moving towards full C#), SQL Server, on platforms like Azure and AWS. We invest in your growth through various training opportunities and events such as Tech Talks, global hackathons, and tech summits., At Exact, we believe in balancing work with personal well-being. With on-site gyms and coffee bars, we are committed to supporting your work-life balance. As a Software Engineer, enjoy additional benefits including:
     * A flexible work contract (32-40 hours/week), with a mix of office and home-based work.
     * A 13th-month salary and compensation for commuting or remote work.
     * Personalized development journey with training sessions, certifications related to Microsoft stack, Azure, AWS, and access to LinkedIn Learning.
     * Home office setup allowance.
     * 27 holidays, 3 volunteer days, and up to 5 loyalty days off.

   Ready to Join Us?

   We'd love to have you on our team! Apply via the link below. Our Talent Acquisition Specialist will reach out within 2-3 days to answer any questions and set up initial discussions with one of our Technology Directors. If mutual interest is established, you'll undertake a coding challenge followed by a second interview to discuss feedback with your potential manager and colleagues. The selection process concludes within two weeks and, if successful, you'll receive an offer to join us at Exact.

   Contact our Talent Acquisition Specialist with any questions. At Exact, big code leads to greater opportunities, and we're excited to see where this journey will take you.

   About Exact

   Exact develops cloud software for small and medium-sized companies and their accountants. The products automate business processes in areas such as Finance and HR and provide specific ERP solutions for wholesale distribution, manufacturing, projects and construction. This saves time and provides insight. It enables customers to work efficiently, make informed decisions and continue growing. More than 675,000 companies primarily in the Netherlands, Belgium and Germany already rely on Exact's software.
job_details.full_text:
Graduate Software Engineer .NET and Frontend JavaScript

Work with our Microsoft tech stack including .NET Framework (transitioning to .NET Core), VB.NET and C# (moving towards full C#), SQL Server, on platforms like Azure and AWS. We invest in your growth through various training opportunities and events such as Tech Talks, global hackathons, and tech summits., At Exact, we believe in balancing work with personal well-being. With on-site gyms and coffee bars, we are committed to supporting your work-life balance. As a Software Engineer, enjoy additional benefits including:
     * A flexible work contract (32-40 hours/week), with a mix of office and home-based work.
     * A 13th-month salary and compensation for commuting or remote work.
     * Personalized development journey with training sessions, certifications related to Microsoft stack, Azure, AWS, and access to LinkedIn Learning.
     * Home office setup allowance.
     * 27 holidays, 3 volunteer days, and up to 5 loyalty days off.

   Ready to Join Us?

   We'd love to have you on our team! Apply via the link below. Our Talent Acquisition Specialist will reach out within 2-3 days to answer any questions and set up initial discussions with one of our Technology Directors. If mutual interest is established, you'll undertake a coding challenge followed by a second interview to discuss feedback with your potential manager and colleagues. The selection process concludes within two weeks and, if successful, you'll receive an offer to join us at Exact.

   Contact our Talent Acquisition Specialist with any questions. At Exact, big code leads to greater opportunities, and we're excited to see where this journey will take you.

   About Exact

   Exact develops cloud software for small and medium-sized companies and their accountants. The products automate business processes in areas such as Finance and HR and provide specific ERP solutions for wholesale distribution, manufacturing, projects and construction. This saves time and provides insight. It enables customers to work efficiently, make informed decisions and continue growing. More than 675,000 companies primarily in the Netherlands, Belgium and Germany already rely on Exact's software.

profile_classification.rationale: The job description focuses on traditional software engineering roles using a Microsoft tech stack (.NET, C#, SQL Server, Azure, AWS) and frontend JavaScript. It does not mention any generative AI technologies, LLMs, RAG, fine-tuning, or other core GenAI concepts. The role is primarily about developing business software for SMEs, which falls outside the scope of GenAI or ML Engineering as defined in the coding book. It is a traditional software engineering role.

job_tasks.justification: The description mentions 'Graduate Software Engineer .NET and Frontend JavaScript' and working with '.NET Framework', '.NET Core', 'VB.NET', 'C#', and 'JavaScript', which are all core to software development.
job_tasks.phrase: Graduate Software Engineer .NET and Frontend JavaScript

job_tasks.justification: The mention of specific programming languages and frameworks like '.NET Framework (transitioning to .NET Core), VB.NET and C# (moving towards full C#)' directly relates to software development tasks.
job_tasks.phrase: .NET Framework (transitioning to .NET Core), VB.NET and C# (moving towards full C#)

job_tasks.justification: SQL Server is a database management system, and working with it implies data storage and retrieval, which is a component of data engineering.
The mention of 'Azure and AWS' indicates work with cloud platforms, which are essential for deploying and managing software and services, aligning with operations engineering.

The description details that Exact develops 'cloud software for small and medium-sized companies and their accountants' and that 'products automate business processes in areas such as Finance and HR and provide specific ERP solutions', indicating a need to understand business domains.
job_tasks.phrase: Exact develops cloud software for small and medium-sized companies and their accountants. The products automate business processes in areas such as Finance and HR and provide specific ERP solutions for wholesale distribution, manufacturing, projects and construction.

job_tasks.justification: The job description explicitly states 'We invest in your growth through various training opportunities and events such as Tech Talks, global hackathons, and tech summits.' and 'Personalized development journey with training sessions, certifications related to Microsoft stack, Azure, AWS, and access to LinkedIn Learning.' This highlights a focus on continuous learning and skill development.
job_tasks.phrase: Personalized development journey with training sessions, certifications related to Microsoft stack, Azure, AWS, and access to LinkedIn Learning.

job_tasks.justification: The description mentions 'Our Talent Acquisition Specialist will reach out within 2-3 days to answer any questions and set up initial discussions with one of our Technology Directors.' and 'a second interview to discuss feedback with your potential manager and colleagues.' This implies interaction and communication with various team members and stakeholders.
job_tasks.phrase: discuss feedback with your potential manager and colleagues

job_tasks.justification: The mention of a 'coding challenge' as part of the selection process indicates an assessment of problem-solving abilities through practical application.

soft_skills.phrase: Personalized development journey with training sessions, certifications related to Microsoft stack, Azure, AWS, and access to LinkedIn Learning.
discuss feedback with your potential manager and colleagues
